trans-unit.source: Update servers with System Updates
trans-unit.target: Update servers with System Updates

trans-unit.source: Learn how you can use the System Updates solution in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights to help you apply missing updates to servers in your infrastructure
trans-unit.target: Learn how you can use the System Updates solution in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights to help you apply missing updates to servers in your infrastructure

trans-unit.source: Update servers with System Updates
trans-unit.target: Update servers with System Updates

trans-unit.source: You can use the System Updates solution in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights to help you apply missing updates to servers in your infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: You can use the System Updates solution in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights to help you apply missing updates to servers in your infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: You install the solution to update the Operations Manager agent and base configuration module for Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: You install the solution to update the Operations Manager agent and base configuration module for Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: Update information is read on the monitored servers and then update data is sent to the Operational Insights service in the cloud for processing.
trans-unit.target: Update information is read on the monitored servers and then update data is sent to the Operational Insights service in the cloud for processing.

trans-unit.source: Logic is applied to the update data and the cloud service records the data.
trans-unit.target: Logic is applied to the update data and the cloud service records the data.

trans-unit.source: If missing updates are found, they are shown on the Updates dashboard.
trans-unit.target: If missing updates are found, they are shown on the Updates dashboard.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Updates dashboard to work with missing updates and develop a plan to apply them to the servers that need them.
trans-unit.target: You can use the Updates dashboard to work with missing updates and develop a plan to apply them to the servers that need them.

trans-unit.source: Use System Updates to update servers
trans-unit.target: Use System Updates to update servers

trans-unit.source: Before you can use system updates in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights, you must have the solution installed.
trans-unit.target: Before you can use system updates in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights, you must have the solution installed.

trans-unit.source: To read more about installing solutions, see <link><linkText>Use the Solutions Gallery to add or remove solutions</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To read more about installing solutions, see <link><linkText>Use the Solutions Gallery to add or remove solutions</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: After it is installed, you can view the updates that are missing from your monitored servers by using the System Update Assessment tile on the Overview page in Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: After it is installed, you can view the updates that are missing from your monitored servers by using the System Update Assessment tile on the Overview page in Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: To work with updates
trans-unit.target: To work with updates

trans-unit.source: On the Overview page, click the System Update Assessment tile.
trans-unit.target: On the Overview page, click the System Update Assessment tile.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>image of the Overview page</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>image of the Overview page</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Updates dashboard, view the update categories.
trans-unit.target: On the Updates dashboard, view the update categories.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>image of the Updates page</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>image of the Updates page</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Scroll to the right of the page to view the Type of Updates Missing blade and then click Security Updates.
trans-unit.target: Scroll to the right of the page to view the Type of Updates Missing blade and then click Security Updates.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>image of the Updates page</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>image of the Updates page</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Search page, a list of security updates that were found missing from servers in your infrastructure is shown.
trans-unit.target: On the Search page, a list of security updates that were found missing from servers in your infrastructure is shown.

trans-unit.source: Click a Knowledge Base article ID (KBID) to view more information about the update that is missing.
trans-unit.target: Click a Knowledge Base article ID (KBID) to view more information about the update that is missing.

trans-unit.source: In this example, KBID 3032323.
trans-unit.target: In this example, KBID 3032323.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>image of the Updates page</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>image of the Updates page</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Your web browser opens the Knowledge Base article that describes the update.
trans-unit.target: Your web browser opens the Knowledge Base article that describes the update.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>image of the Updates page</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>image of the Updates page</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Using the using the information you've found, you can create a plan to apply missing updates.
trans-unit.target: Using the using the information you've found, you can create a plan to apply missing updates.
